idea-plugin.name: IDE Bridge for Claude
idea-plugin.description:
Exposes IDE editor context via HTTP endpoints for Claude Code MCP integration.

Features:
  • HTTP server on localhost:63343
  • Editor selection with file path, line numbers, language
  • IDE errors and warnings
  • Open files/tabs list
  • Git status (branch, changes)
  • Recently opened files
  • Symbol info at cursor
  • Automatic update notifications
